object.content:
♥♛♥ The True Endless Beauty of Nature ♥♛♥
Majestic, Breathtaking Eternal Presence of our Nature ♥ Céad Míle Fáilte ♥ Ceud Mìle Fàilte ♥ Tausendfach Willkommen ♥♛♥ Majestic ❀ Enchanting ζαφείρι μπλε πεταλούδα ♥♛♥ Like a Fairytale ❀ "A Magical Path Meanders its Way Through the Enchanted Garden" ❀ Magical ❀ Breathtaking ❀ Balance ❀ Harmony ❀ Love & Bright Light be with You always Ranger Marcus Mcadam ✯♛✯

✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯
"Fairies, come take me out of this dull world, For I would ride with you upon the wind, Run on the top of the dishevelled tide, And dance upon the mountains like a flame." William Butler Yeats

✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯✯
"Die wahre Schönheit manifestiert sich in den Strahlen, die aus dem Allerheiligsten der Seele dringen; ihr Leuchten bricht aus dem Innersten hervor, ebenso wie sich das Leben aus dem tiefsten Kern in Blumen und Blüten ergießt, denen es Farbe und Duft verleiht." ~ Khalil Gibran

✯✯✯✯✯✯ ♥♛♥ ✯✯✯♥♛♥✯✯✯ ♥♛♥ ✯✯✯✯✯✯
Please visit his awesome page on facebook - Marcus McAdam Photography. See all his majestic, breathtaking, gorgeous, and enchanting work.
✯✯✯✯✯✯ ♥♛♥ ✯✯✯♥♛♥✯✯✯ ♥♛♥ ✯✯✯✯✯✯

✯♛✯ A few people have asked if I got any shots of the golden eagles buzzing over my head this morning? Do you think I would miss that! Usually shooting eagles against the sky doesn't work, but the low sun lighting the underside of their wings improves things. Here are a few shots for those interested., by Admirable Precious Handsome Marcus McAdam,♥♥♥ ✯♛✯
